categories.name: Web Development
categories.description: Learn to build modern websites and web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks.

categories.name: Data Science
categories.description: Master data analysis, visualization, and machine learning techniques using Python and related tools.

categories.name: Mobile Development
categories.description: Build native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android.

categories.name: Machine Learning
categories.description: Explore artificial intelligence, deep learning, and neural networks.

categories.name: Cloud Computing

categories.name: DevOps
categories.description: Master CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and infrastructure automation.

categories.name: Cybersecurity
categories.description: Understand security principles, ethical hacking, and network protection strategies.

categories.name: Database Management
categories.description: Learn SQL, NoSQL, and database design for efficient data storage and retrieval.

categories.name: Programming Languages
categories.description: Deep-dive into languages like Python, Java, C++, Go, and Rust.

categories.name: UI/UX Design
categories.description: Design intuitive user interfaces and create delightful user experiences.
